get.summary: Get the list of debtor cases with some basic information using Nova debtor number

200.description: Returns the core case information (object_identifiers, state, registration and closed) for the specified Nova debtor number

objectIdentifiers.description: PartyObjectIdentifierDto can either be CreditorObjectIdentifiersDto or DebtorObjectIdentifiersDto

interestToDate.description: MAX interest to date from related debts and costs

500.description: The server encountered an error while processing the request

get.summary: Gets the detailed case information using Nova debtor number and case number

200.description: Returns the detailed case information for the specified Nova debtor number and case number

objectIdentifiers.description: PartyObjectIdentifierDto can either be CreditorObjectIdentifiersDto or DebtorObjectIdentifiersDto

interestToDate.description: MAX interest to date from related debts and costs

500.description: The server encountered an error while processing the request

get.summary: Gets the Claims based on specified debtor number

role.description: Interest condition based on role type

500.description: The server encountered an error while processing the request

get.summary: Finds debtor using Nova debtor number

200.description: Returns the core debtor information (name, postal address, contact information, registration, and statistics information) for the specified Nova debtor number

wrongAddressDate.description: Date on which the Wrong address was provided

doNotCallDate.description: Date on which the Do not call was selected

emailOkDate.description: Date on which the email Id was confirmed

date.description: Date on which the Debtor was registered in Nova

items.description: Number of injunction or distress calls made by  the 'Person'

value.description: Number of injunction or distress calls

500.description: The server encountered an error while processing the request

get.summary: Finds debtors using a unique personal identification number (Debtor Id)

200.description: Returns the basic debtor information (name and Nova debtor Id) for the specified debtor Id number

wrongAddressDate.description: Date on which the Wrong address was provided

doNotCallDate.description: Date on which the Do not call was selected

emailOkDate.description: Date on which the email Id was confirmed

date.description: Date on which the Debtor was registered in Nova

items.description: Number of injunction or distress calls made by  the 'Person'

value.description: Number of injunction or distress calls

500.description: The server encountered an error while processing the request

post.summary: Validates user credentials and returns a token for accessing the APIs.

200.description: Access token enabling user to access the Nova APIs

500.description: The server encountered an error while processing the request

get.summary: Gets message based on receiver or sender type

parameters.name: entityType
parameters.description: Message sender or receiver entity type

parameters.name: objectSubId
parameters.description: Creditor department number if the message sender or receiver type is creditor

parameters.name: includeNames
parameters.description: Includes names of message receiver and sender with response if the default value is true

sendDate.description: Date on which the message was sent

500.description: The server encountered an error while processing the request

post.summary: Sends message to debtor or creditor

sendDate.description: Date on which the message was sent

sendDate.description: Date on which the message was sent

get.summary: Search message by collector, creditor or debtor.

parameters.name: searchBy
parameters.description: Search message sent or received by collector, debtor or creditor

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: Nova collector Id, creditor Id or debtor Id

parameters.name: depNo
parameters.description: Department number when searching content by creditor

sendDate.description: Date on which the message was sent

500.description: The server encountered an error while processing the request

get.summary: Gets the payments based on specified debtor number

bookedAmount.description: Amount from the payments being distributed ondebts or costs

amortisationPlan.description: Tells whether payment is made against case, debtor or amortisation plan

date.description: Date on which the Debtor was registered in Nova

500.description: The server encountered an error while processing the request

post.summary:
Displays debtor or case pop-up in Nova desktop client application based on information received from an external telephony system.

Note: This method is deprecated and will be removed in future releases.

AgentId.description: User Id of external telephony system

ObjectType.description: Value of ObjectType: The default value is 4.1 = Case, 4 = Debtor

post.summary: Displays debtor or case pop-up in Nova desktop client application based on information received from an external telephony system.
Displays debtor or case pop-up in Nova desktop client application based on information received from an external telephony system.

Bearer.name: Authorization
Bearer.description: Authorization header using the Bearer scheme. Example: "Authorization: Bearer {token}"
